title: Tile, late 18th–early 19th century
medium: Earthenware, glazed and high frie decorated
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Still life of lemon and grapes on a plate, a knife, and oil and vinegar flasks.

Tile, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Earthenware, glazed and high frie decorated. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1920-15-14.
